name: Super Zombie Arcade (itch)
description:
(game is a WIP) A small game where you kill zombies to gain score

  • WASD for movement
  • Hold down Shift to sprint
  • Left Click to shoot
  • G for Grenade
  • 1 to switch to Slot 1
  • 2 to switch to Slot 2
  • Press E while over a buyable object to buy it
  • Press Enter to restart
  • Press R to reload
